name: Valiant Force
storyline:
Embark on an unforgettable journey as you plunge into a visually stunning fantasy world of magical battles and epic story. Recruit unique characters and create the greatest assembly of Heroes to have ever existed.

Challenge yourself to make strategic decisions in engaging turn-based combat. Master the aura trigger system to defeat devious foes, advance through diverse job paths, gather powerful equipment, and unlock incredible skills.

Forge a glorious garrison as the final bastion of light against the encroaching darkness and engrave your acts of valor into the archives of history forevermore.
summary: Enter the world of Valiant Force, an epic adventure of wit and strategy. Set in the fantasy world of Arathos, you can wield powerful spells and empower allies with crafty enchantments. Think ten steps ahead and control the flow of battle. Summon and collect mighty allies and build the strongest team Arathos has ever seen.
